name: Herman Finds a Home
description:
It's moving day for Herman. Help him locate his new home from the crowd of shells.

Match the pattern on the shell with the pattern that Herman has for each of the ten levels before time runs out. Locate the right shell on sand or behind the rocks, dragging and rotating them to make it easier to find the right one for Herman.

-------

Controls:

LMB - Click and drag a shell. Drag the correct shell to Herman to complete each level.

RMB - Rotate the shell 90* to make it easier to locate the correct shell.

-------

Created for Week162(Crabs) of the Weekly Game Jam

Music - CandyLand by Pro-Sound Collection
